newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT - Interpump coverage initiated. [CORRECTED 14:00 GMT]
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Interpump coverage initiated. [CORRECTED 14:00 GMT]

text.p: Goldman Sachs said it had initiated coverage of Italian pump and piston group Interpump with a "market outperformer" rating on Tuesday. (Corrects rating)
The investment bank gave the shares a twelve month price target of 6,300 lire per share.
